title: Highest Merchandise Imports from Latin America & the Caribbean
description: In 2023, 50.79% of Nicaragua's total merchandise imports came from low- and middle-income economies in Latin America & the Caribbean, the highest percentage globally.

title: Lowest Net Official Flows from UNDP
description: In 2016, Nicaragua had a net official flow from UNDP of -$29,206.86, the lowest recorded globally.
